properties.entry: insert into matching_rules (name, settings, entity_name, active, preprocessing, auto_merge, storage_fkey, description) values (:name, :settings, :entity_name, :active, :preprocessing, :auto_merge, :storage_fkey, :description)

update matching_rules set name = :name, settings = :settings, entity_name = :entity_name, active = :active, preprocessing = :preprocessing, auto_merge = :auto_merge, storage_fkey = :storage_fkey, description = :description where id = :id
select id, name, settings, entity_name, active, preprocessing, auto_merge, storage_fkey, description from matching_rules
select id, name, settings, entity_name, active, preprocessing, auto_merge, storage_fkey, description from matching_rules where entity_name = :entity_name and storage_fkey = :storage_fkey
select id, name, settings, entity_name, active, preprocessing, auto_merge, storage_fkey, description from matching_rules where id = :id

select id, name, settings, entity_name, active, preprocessing, auto_merge, storage_fkey, description from matching_rules where entity_name = :entity_name and name = :name and storage_fkey = :storage_fkey
insert into matching_algorithms (algorithm_id, rule_id, data) values (:algorithm_id, :rule_id, :data)
select id, algorithm_id, rule_id, data from matching_algorithms where rule_id = :rule_id order by id asc
